items.description: Serves at least 6. Includes chips, salsa, revuelta salad (romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, red bell peppers, jicama, cilantro dressing), rice, Black or Refried beans, and choice of one item from the following: Enchilada, Hard Shell Taco, Taquitos, Tamale, or Chile Relleno. Priced per person. 10 person minimum order. 10 order minimum.
items.title: Catering Menu #1 with One-Item Combo

items.description: Serves at least 6. Includes Caesar salad (romaine hearts, croutons, parmesan cheese, creamy anchovy dressing), chips, salsa, rice, Black or Refried beans, mixed tortillas, choice of half order of an entree protein (Carne Asada, Chicken Diabla, Chicken Veracruz, or Chile Colorado), and choice of one item from the following: Enchilada, Hard Shell Taco, Tamale, or Chile Relleno. Priced per person. 10 person minimum order.  10 order minimum.
